Evaluation.explanation: The candidate lists a solid range of languages and frameworks including Java, Python, SQL, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, React, React Native, Node.js, and Express.JS. They also list relevant developer tools. The projects demonstrate practical application of these skills. The experience section shows real-world application of React, demonstrating a good understanding. However, the CV could benefit from specifying the versions of the technologies used and detailing the specific use cases in each project to better highlight the depth of proficiency.

The CV describes project implementations and features, implying problem-solving. For instance, developing the React-based game website and the Ads Management Website involved overcoming technical challenges. However, the candidate doesn't explicitly describe specific debugging or problem-solving situations they encountered and how they resolved them. Adding specific examples using the STAR method would strengthen this section.

The candidate's involvement in the 'Thach thuc' Technical Department, especially as a Vice Chairman, suggests teamwork and leadership. The project descriptions highlight working on team projects. However, the CV lacks specific examples of how the candidate communicated technical information to non-technical audiences or resolved conflicts within a team. Including these details would improve the score.

The candidate lists multiple projects using various technologies which shows an eagerness to learn. Their involvement in the GDSC Solution Hackathon suggests they are open to new technologies and challenges. However, the CV does not explicitly state how the candidate stays up-to-date with the latest industry trends or any specific courses or certifications they have pursued. Adding these details would strengthen the impression of continuous learning.

The candidate lists HTML/CSS as a technical skill and mentions using HTML and Bootstrap for the front-end interface of the Ads Management Website. This indicates a good understanding and application of HTML/CSS. Mentioning specific CSS preprocessors or responsive design techniques used would further enhance this section.

The candidate lists JavaScript as a technical skill and mentions using it in the Ads Management Website. Developing a React-based game website also highlights JavaScript proficiency. Specifying the use of JavaScript frameworks and libraries beyond React in more detail would be beneficial.

The candidate lists SQL (Postgres) as a technical skill and mentions using Express.JS, MongoDB and PostgreSQL in various projects. Developing RESTful APIs using NodeJS, ExpressJS, Mongoose, and MongoDB also demonstrates backend knowledge. However, PHP is not explicitly mentioned in project descriptions, even though listed as a technical skill.

The candidate lists Git as a developer tool. The provided GitHub link allows for verification of their contribution history. However, the CV lacks details about their experience with Git workflows, branching strategies, or conflict resolution. Elaborating on these aspects would improve the score.
